description: Schema for submitting an information on genetic modification.
title: Genetic Modification

___description.description: A plain text description of the genetic modification.
___description.title: Description

___target.description: The name of the gene whose expression or product is modified by the genetic modification.
___target.title: Target

___url.description: An external resource with additional information about the modification.
___url.title: URL

___assembly.description: The genome assembly to which modification coordinates relate. e.g. GRCh38.
___assembly.title: Mapping assembly

___chromosome.description: The number (or letter) designation for the target chromosome. e.g. 1, 2L, or X
___chromosome.title: Chromosome

___end.description: The ending coordinate (possibly equal to the starting coordinate for one base.)
___end.title: End

___treatments.description: Treatment(s) used to perform the genetic modification.
___treatments.title: Treatments

items.description: Treatment used to perform the genetic modification.
items.title: Treatment

___modification_type.description: The type of the genetic modification.
___modification_type.title: Modification type

___zygosity.description: The zygosity of the genetic modification.
___zygosity.title: Modification zygosity

___modification_techniques.description: Genetic modification technique(s)/tool(s) used to perform the modification.
___modification_techniques.title: Modification techniques

___purpose.description: The purpose of the genetic modification.
___purpose.title: Purpose
